H0.text: Whose horse was called Incitatus. Nero

H1.text: Whose horse was called Incitatus. Commodus

H2.text: Whose horse was called Incitatus. Elagabalus

H3.text: Whose horse was called Incitatus. Caligola

A4.text: Caligula's favourite racehorse was named Incitatus.

A5.text: Suetonius and Dio outline Caligula's proposal to promote his favourite racehorse, Incitatus, to consul.
